Monster Search.alt: Screenshot of Monster Search web app showing monster details
Monster Search.description: A web app that lets users look up monsters by name or ID, showing their stats, types, and abilities. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Cash Register.alt: Screenshot of Cash Register app calculating change
Cash Register.description: A JavaScript app that simulates a cash register by calculating change and returning the correct currency breakdown. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

US Phone Number Validator.alt: Screenshot of US Phone Number Validator input and validation result
US Phone Number Validator.description: A tool that checks if a number matches valid US phone formats using regex. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Roman Numeral Converter.alt: Screenshot of Roman Numeral Converter converting number to Roman numerals
Roman Numeral Converter.description: An interactive tool that converts numbers into Roman numerals up to 3999. It validates input, handles edge cases, and gives instant results. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Palindrome Checker.alt: Screenshot of Palindrome Checker app showing input and result
Palindrome Checker.description: A text utility that detects whether a word or phrase is a palindrome. It ignores punctuation, spaces, and capitalization, giving users instant feedback. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Survey Form.alt: Screenshot of Survey Form project with input fields and submit button
Survey Form.description: A responsive form project showcasing text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons with clean HTML structure and CSS styling.

Product Landing Page.alt: Screenshot of Product Landing Page project with product sections and call-to-action
Product Landing Page.description: A single-page layout with sections for features, pricing, and a call-to-action. Built with semantic HTML and styled with CSS for responsiveness.

Technical Documentation Page.alt: Screenshot of Technical Documentation Page project with sidebar navigation and content
Technical Documentation Page.description: A documentation-style page featuring a fixed sidebar and scrollable content area. Uses HTML for structure and CSS for layout and readability.

Tribute Page.alt: Screenshot of Tribute Page project with heading, image, and text content
Tribute Page.description: A tribute page with a centered layout, image, and descriptive text. Demonstrates basic HTML semantics and simple responsive CSS design.

Portfolio Page.alt: Screenshot of Portfolio Page project with navigation bar, welcome section, services grid, and GitHub link
Portfolio Page.description: A responsive personal portfolio mockup featuring an about section, services grid, and contact area with GitHub link. Built with HTML and CSS to demonstrate layout and responsiveness.
